doc: A token displayed on the Trails Making test. This is a outlined circle with text displayed in the center of the circle.
name: token

fields.name: text
fields.doc: The text display in the center of the token

fields.name: x
fields.doc: The center of the token in the X direction in pixels relative to the dimensions of the task container

fields.name: y
fields.doc: The center of the token in the X direction in pixels relative to the dimensions of the task container
